activities: As a Managed Service Provider, we offer e-mail encryption services.  Often, organizations will secure confidential information by using our encryption services.
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, health and financial information.  This information is not  manually processed but follows though our e-mail delivery systems..
recoursemech: Any complaints related to this Policy or FiLink’s compliance with the US-EU and US-Switzerland Safe Harbor Principles that cannot be resolved through FiLink’s internal process shall be subject to the TRUSTe Dispute Resolution Requirements. To raise a complaint that cannot be resolved through FiLink’s internal process you may contact TRUSTe online at https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request, by fax at 415- 520-3420, or by mail at Watchdog Complaints, TRUSTe, 55 2nd Street, 2nd Floor, San Francisco, CA, USA 94105.
